product_name: NUDESTIX Gel Color Lip + Cheek Balm
user_specs: ['Eye Color Brown', 'Hair color Brunette', 'Skin Tone Olive', 'Skin Type Combination']
review_content: This product is exactly what I was looking for; lightweight, the perfect nude in comparison to my skin tone (I wear a 230 in maybelline fit me foundation and have yellow undertones). Literally looks like your lips but better. It doesn't stay on too well after eating though and I have yet to try it as a cheek balm.

product_name: NUDESTIX Gel Color Lip + Cheek Balm
user_specs: ['Eye Color Green', 'Hair color Brunette', 'Skin Tone Fair', 'Skin Type Oily']
review_content:
I’m a lipstick freak - I have probably 100 or more glosses, lipsticks, chapsticks, creams, stains, you name it! But girl, it stops here. I’m buying my THIRD one (I have never done that with any other brand). The Luxe color gives this beautiful pop of salmon pink - (but still slightly natural) that I cannot find anywhere else. It’s also not a gloss or lipstick or cream look - it’s so unique that you literally have to try it to see what I’m talking about. The case is big enough to also include a gloss over it if you want an extra BAM in the evenings. Does not dry and stays put more than most lipsticks.

review_content: ...but it is waxy, and didn't feel very comfortable going on. I won't hold the color against it, since I did receive it as a sample, but I would have been disappointed by how much lighter it was than what appears on the website had I actually purchased it. That said, it blended very naturally into my cheeks, and provided a nice shine to the lips. I just don't think it's enough to warrant a full-size purchase.

product_name: NUDESTIX Gel Color Lip + Cheek Balm
user_specs: ['Eye Color Blue', 'Hair color Black', 'Skin Tone Fair', 'Skin Type Combination']
review_content: I love the color on both my cheeks and lips which is a huge bonus as I have purchased many that only look good on cheeks but not lips! Only complaint is because it comes as pencil, it is easy for lip application but not so much on the cheeks. I end of having to "draw" the color onto my finger and then apply because if I apply directly onto my cheek the resulting line is hard to blend.

product_name: NUDESTIX Gel Color Lip + Cheek Balm
user_specs: ['Eye Color Green', 'Hair color Brunette', 'Skin Tone Fair', 'Skin Type Combination']

product_name: NUDESTIX Gel Color Lip + Cheek Balm

Standard sharpeners do not work on these pencils:(

product_name: NUDESTIX Gel Color Lip + Cheek Balm
user_specs: ['Eye Color Brown', 'Hair color Brunette', 'Skin Tone Porcelain', 'Skin Type Oily']
review_content:
I love the gel finish of this lip color. It's as solid as a lipstick but so smooth and natural-looking. Not as goopy or shiny as a gloss, but not chalky, patchy, or clumpy as more matte formulas can sometimes be. Very foolproof to apply. Lasts as well as a standard lipstick, in my experience (will transfer a little to cups and tissues, etc. but I only need to reapply after eating). Has no taste or smell. Mildly moisturizing though not quite a balm.

product_name: NUDESTIX Gel Color Lip + Cheek Balm
user_specs: ['Eye Color Hazel', 'Hair color Brunette', 'Skin Tone Medium', 'Skin Type Normal']
review_title: Easy application but no staying power
review_content: The colour is great and the application is easy and doesn’t require a lip liner or primer, but this lipstick has NO staying power. I had to reapply frequently even before lunch. Haven’t tried it as a cheek colour as it’s a little dark, but I don’t think I’ll be purchasing nudestix as a lip colour again.

product_name: NUDESTIX Gel Color Lip + Cheek Balm
user_specs: ['Eye Color Green', 'Hair color Brunette', 'Skin Tone Medium', 'Skin Type Dry']
review_content: Bought this in Tay Tay as I wanted a quick everyday nude that looked like I put on a lipstick and a gloss in one. This nailed it! Great shade, super flattering, easy to apply and lasts. I throw this in my bag and I use as a lipstick/gloss (it legit looks like you’ve put on both) as well as a touch up dewy blush. Going to buy more shades!

product_name: NUDESTIX Gel Color Lip + Cheek Balm
user_specs: ['Eye Color Brown', 'Hair color Brunette', 'Skin Tone Olive', 'Skin Type Combination']
review_title: Beautiful glossy lip natural cheek flush in one!
review_content:
This stuff is amazing. It is very comfortable to wear on the lips and I dot some on my cheeks too, blend it out, and it provides a wonderful flush w/out any sticky tacky feel. I tried several colors to see which could be a good blush and lip color for me, and I was shocked when it wound up being 'pulse' only because I have an incredibly hard time finding a lighter lip color that actually covers my lips as they are very pigmented. Lighter colors can also wash me out, but this one enhances and provides a semi-realistic glow. For reference I have medium-light neutral skin, and my lips at their deepest are almost mauvey-purple. Using it on the cheeks lasts a long time for a little amount of product, and on the lips it remains dewy/glossy, so it will wear off if you eat and drink during the day. I believe the deeper colors leave behind a stain, but pulse is too light for that kind of effect. The packaging is something I never particularly care for, but in this case it is extremely useful. You get the stick and also a separate sharpener, and in the lid of the tin you also get a magnifying mirror. The packaging has enough room to be used to house 2-3 items in your bag if you remove the sharpener. I have tried and purchased a couple nudestix products and find them to be amazing quality and they do not look like you are being worn by the makeup, but very much that you are enhancing your own natural beauty. Highly recommend this and wish I could give it bonus stars.

Its literally a stub at this point - J Mama is the PERFECT my lips but better shade for me - I'm fair skinned with neutral undertones and this color just puts everything together. The gel is perfect! I can rub my lips together all I want without fear of it being too glossy and getting stringy, nor too matte and having the lipstick crumble. I can't wait to repurchase.

product_name: NUDESTIX Gel Color Lip + Cheek Balm
user_specs: ['Eye Color Blue', 'Hair color Brunette', 'Skin Tone Light', 'Skin Type Normal']
review_content:
I like this lipstick and this colour a lot, but I won't buy it again. First of all, you constantly have to sharpen it. And every time you do, you lose some lipstick to the edges of the sharpener. It's a waste. When I get to the end, I imagine I won't be able to use the last of it at all. As well, I really object to having to buy a new case and sharpener every single time I buy a product. It's not possible to get replacements on their own. How many cases and sharpeners does one person need? Not that many. It's just landfill and wasted money. So I will find another brand that has just as good a colour and product. There are lots of choices. Nudestix should consider revising their packaging to be less wasteful.

These may be the cheapest I've put in my purse, the packaging is meh, certainly not luxe but the payoff is in your lips! Highly recommend!

user_specs: ['Age 18-24', 'Skin Tone Fair', 'Eye Color Blue']
review_content:
Honestly, I was so disinterested in this product at the beginning. I love really pigmented long-wearing lip colour. But I decided to try it for no-makeup makeup days, and I absolutely love it! I have posh and haven and they are both gorgeous neutrals that do wear for a long time, and are really hydrating on the lips. I also wear them as a topper to refresh my liquid lipsticks halfway through the day if they're getting a little dry or wearing off. I haven't used it on my face at all, but it's not sticky so I could see it working out if you like cream blushes.

product_name: NUDESTIX Gel Color Lip + Cheek Balm
review_content:
Never wanted to try Nudestick at all because it looks so much like the Nars or Bite Beauty. When I received it in the sample bag, I even thought of giving it away. However, it is so hydrating and the colour looks so good. It stays on my lips and keeps them so comfortable. Now I'd like to purchase a few more of these. The one thing I don't like is you need a pencil sharpener and the lipstick will get shorter and shorter...

product_name: NUDESTIX Gel Color Lip + Cheek Balm
user_specs: ['Skin Tone Medium', 'Eye Color Green']
review_content:
You can't go by the swatch online. Pulse is the color of my lips when I was in my twenties and thirty's. It's pigmented enough that I don't even need a lip liner. But if you want extra pigment and staying power I recommend getting the NUDESTIX Lip + Cheek Pencil in the shade Mystic. They pair perfectly together. They sharpen beautifully...in other words the consistency of the product isn't overly soft. I've finally found my go-to lip product. No more skinny, drying pencil liners that break or need frequent sharpenings. I'm super confident you will love my recommendations if you're looking for a gorgeous pigmented natural believable lip.

user_specs: ['Age 35-44', 'Skin Tone Light', 'Eye Color Green']
review_content: I got this in Pulse and I LOVE it. In the picture it looks like a deep plum but in person, it goes on as a sheer, sexy "my lips but better" nude. I like it on my cheeks as well, although I did add a dusting of powder blush for a stronger color payoff. This product is fantastic and I can;t wait to buy more colors.

product_name: NUDESTIX Gel Color Lip + Cheek Balm

review_content:
This product was a little underwhelming for me. I purchased the colour Luxe. The colour pigmentation wasn't as strong as I would usually like for my lips, and ended up seeming much more sheer and neutral than bright. I liked it, but wasn't wowed. As for use on cheeks, I found that the product was way too sticky for me. It didn't blend out nicely with fingers or brush, and took a pretty damp beauty blender to get it to work on the cheeks even a little.

product_name: NUDESTIX Gel Color Lip + Cheek Balm
review_title: Love it. Great for a light nude look and more.
review_content:
Absolutely love the gel colour lip + cheek balm in Luxe. It's a wonderfully fresh pink colour that gives a nicely blushed cheek. The subtle shimmer of the gel really freshens my face and gives a beautiful glow. Definitely use the same colour on the lips as you do the cheeks, it really brings out those features. This is probably my favourite Nudestix product so far. For a light nude makeup routine I use the Luxe gel colour for lip/cheek, two different shades of their concealer pencils as foundation/contour, and light mascara. Makes me feel comfortable and beautiful in my own skin.

product_name: NUDESTIX Gel Color Lip + Cheek Balm
review_content:
I bought this because another reviewer recommended these over Nars and LOVE it. So easy to use - creamy texture makes it fool proof to apply. I didn't realize I could also use this on my cheeks when I bought it, but have been using it non stop for lips AND cheeks. Wicked (perfect berry) is my color. I have medium skin tone but my friend who is pale uses it too. It's literally fool proof. Also the tin that it comes in has a mirror inside so you can apply on the go. Really diggin this brand!

review_content: I wasn't sure if I would like this but I really do! I have the color Pulse and it is the color of my lips but enhanced. It is not as drying as a lipstick and is more matte. It lasts about the same as a lipstick. I have not used the sharpener yet.

product_name: NUDESTIX Gel Color Lip + Cheek Balm
user_specs: ['Age 25-34', 'Skin Tone Medium', 'Eye Color Green']
review_title: Amazing product!!! Color that stays on!
review_content:
First of all, I'm now obsessed w Nudestix after buying like 10 of their products. I'm a convert from NARS which has had my heart for years. Let me start by confessing that I am a lip product junkie and own 1,000 lipsticks. This is by FAR the best I have ever tried. This color is amazing. It's the perfect texture for summer. I can put it on my lips and cheeks without a mirror which is KEY. I love the moisture- it really is a balm, which is hard to find with great color that stays on. I recommend this to EVERYONE! If you're thinking about trying it, make sure to get a few extras because you'll want to give them to your fave people.

product_name: NUDESTIX Gel Color Lip + Cheek Balm
review_content: I bought a single stick, in Luxe, that I love. So I bought the plum mini set for my bag, but.... the tips broke off on opening, and the gel oozes everwhere. I try to smear the colorwith my fingers, and dig some out with a brush. I've gotten 2 other brands of gel sticks and never had this problem before. The colors are lovely, but the formulation is unreliable!

product_name: NUDESTIX Gel Color Lip + Cheek Balm
review_content: I got this in pulse, luxe and rebel and I am in love. I want every shade! I am excited to try the darker colours.

product_name: NUDESTIX Gel Color Lip + Cheek Balm
review_content: Came to my local store looking for a new lip product for a baby shower I had to attend the next day. I discovered "Raven" through an associate and I've been using it a lot ever since. The packaging is cute, the mirror behind the lid is such a cute idea. I highly recommend this product.

product_name: NUDESTIX Gel Color Lip + Cheek Balm
user_specs: ['Age 25-34', 'Skin Tone Fair', 'Eye Color Green']
review_title: Who lives for this? I do.
review_content:
I received Pulse in the short lived (quickly sold out?) Nudestix #nudelipkit, a trio of three "minis" (read: short with the same amount as a full-size stick) in all three formulas, preempting the launch of the Gel Color Lip + Cheek Balm. Unlike the counterparts in Matte and whatever that regular formula is, the gel lip color is slippery and a bit shiny, truly embodying a highly pigmented balm. The color lasts and leaves behind a nice enough stain and it was the perfect transition from "I'm wearing matte lipstick because I've got it together and it's daylight!" and "holy jeez it's midnight I need something comfortable and I need to still look good." Whatever. I'll probably buy at least 3 of the full-size shades. This stuff is great. Nudstix needs the hype it deserves.

product_name: NUDESTIX Gel Color Lip + Cheek Balm
user_specs: ['Age 45-54', 'Skin Tone Olive', 'Eye Color Blue']
review_title: Really like the color and control of a soft pencil
review_content:
I got Rebel which is a real pretty medium pink a little softer than bubblegum pink but definitely in that range. I like the pencil because you don't need a liner. It goes on the lips and cheeks well, looks real pretty on fair skin and wears longer than a lot of moisturizing lip products I have. Also, this did not dry out my lips at all. I got a matte pencil of theirs that was very drying but this went on smooth, evenly pigmented and left my lips soft with no drying out which is a hard find for me. I have very dry lips and always have to use moisturizing lip products during wear and after removal. I love the sharpener cap that comes in the tin to pop-on once it is needed. The sharpener does sharpen really well without to much waste when you use it. I hate wasting product so I use a small plastic pop top oil paint container for the pink removed from shavings to use on my cheeks so I add a small amount of an SPF BB cream since my cheeks need the most sun protection, on a side note I use BB because I don't wear foundation. But it can be done with anything from primer, moisturizer, even foundation. I usually prefer twist up pencils so there would be less waste but at the same time, twist ups also dry out and break easier so it works out saving it like I do because it is pretty as a blush color too. The only improvement I could see in this product line is to give a choice to buy just the pencil at a cheaper price as a refill. I like the case but when I like a color as well as Rebel and Whisper (matte pencil I use as bronzer) I would prefer to buy the pencil for a cheaper price than collect extra tins and sharpeners. Since they don't offer this I do reuse and add side labels with lipsticks and "the look" inside like; day red, evening red, pink nude, plum nude, etc. I also stuff with extra samples and give to friends just as a fun thing or pre-shop day. The tins are just to nice to just toss away. I'm sure I will find more crafty ways to reuse them but I would prefer the option to by the pencil itself for cheaper.
…read more

product_name: NUDESTIX Gel Color Lip + Cheek Balm
review_content: This lipstick is amazing. It's appears to be matte, but not drying at all! Major staple in my makeup bag. Also, the packaging is adorable!
